statements: SELECT * FROM asset_ownership
SELECT owner_name, owner_address, token_id FROM asset_ownership
SELECT asset_id, owner_name FROM asset_ownership WHERE owner_name LIKE '%John%'
SELECT * FROM asset_ownership WHERE asset_id = '123' AND owner_address = '123 Main St'
SELECT owner_name, owner_address FROM asset_ownership ORDER BY owner_name DESC
SELECT * FROM asset_ownership WHERE owner_name = 'Alice' ORDER BY owner_address ASC;
SELECT asset_id, owner_name, owner_address FROM asset_ownership WHERE token_id = '12345';
SELECT DISTINCT owner_name FROM asset_ownership WHERE owner_address LIKE '%California%';
SELECT asset_id, owner_name, owner_address FROM asset_ownership WHERE owner_name LIKE 'J%' AND owner_address LIKE '%Street%';
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT owner_name) AS total_owners, COUNT(*) AS total_assets FROM asset_ownership WHERE token_id IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM assets WHERE owner_id = 1;
SELECT asset_name, owner_id FROM assets WHERE token_id = 123;
SELECT asset_id, asset_name, owner_id FROM assets WHERE token_id = 456 ORDER BY owner_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM ownership WHERE token_id = 789 ORDER BY ownership_start_date DESC;
SELECT owner_id, asset_name FROM assets WHERE owner_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM assets WHERE owner_id = 1;
SELECT asset_name, owner_id FROM assets WHERE token_id IN (1,2,3) ORDER BY asset_id DESC;
SELECT asset_id, ownership_start_date FROM ownership WHERE owner_id = 2 AND ownership_end_date IS NULL;
SELECT asset_name, ownership_start_date, ownership_end_date FROM assets JOIN ownership ON assets.asset_id = ownership.asset_id WHERE ownership_end_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT MAX(asset_id) AS max_asset_id, COUNT(owner_id) AS owner_count FROM assets GROUP BY token_id ORDER BY max_asset_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_accounts
SELECT asset_id, owner_id, ownership_start, ownership_end FROM asset_ownership ORDER BY ownership_start DESC
SELECT token_id, tokenization_date FROM tokenization_records WHERE tokenization_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT user_id, username FROM user_accounts WHERE username LIKE '%john%'
SELECT asset_id, owner_id FROM asset_ownership WHERE owner_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
SELECT * FROM asset_ownership WHERE ownership_start > '2022-01-01';
SELECT owner_id, token_id FROM asset_ownership WHERE asset_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT token_id, asset_id FROM tokenization_records WHERE tokenization_date < '2022-01-01' ORDER BY tokenization_date DESC;
SELECT username, email FROM user_accounts WHERE registration_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY username ASC;

SELECT a.asset_id, a.owner_id, a.ownership_start, t.tokenization_date FROM asset_ownership a JOIN tokenization_records t ON a.token_id = t.token_id ORDER BY a.ownership_start DESC, t.tokenization_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM assets;
SELECT asset_name, owner_id FROM assets WHERE token_id = '50ec572f-0c01-4477-9cc5-2d4d1259a764';
SELECT owner_name, contact_info FROM owners WHERE owner_id = '24c7f8a3-e33e-4ea5-9f16-535e2aad25f1';
SELECT * FROM tokens WHERE token_type = 'ERC20';
SELECT asset_name, owner_name, ownership_date FROM assets JOIN ownership ON assets.asset_id = ownership.asset_id WHERE ownership_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM assets;
SELECT asset_id, asset_name, token_id FROM assets ORDER BY asset_name ASC;
SELECT owner_name, contact_info FROM owners WHERE contact_info IS NOT NULL;
SELECT asset_id, token_value FROM tokens WHERE token_value > 1000;
SELECT asset_name, owner_name, token_symbol FROM assets JOIN owners ON assets.owner_id = owners.owner_id JOIN tokens ON assets.token_id = tokens.token_id;
SELECT * FROM asset_tokens;
SELECT asset_name, token_value FROM asset_tokens ORDER BY asset_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM ownership WHERE owner_name = 'Alice';
SELECT token_id, transaction_type, transaction_date FROM transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'BUY' ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT username, role FROM user_roles WHERE role = 'Admin';
SELECT * FROM asset_tokens ORDER BY asset_name DESC;
SELECT token_owner, COUNT(token_id) AS tokens_count FROM asset_tokens GROUP BY token_owner;
SELECT asset_name, token_value FROM asset_tokens WHERE token_value > 1000;
SELECT u.username, r.role, t.transaction_type FROM user_roles u JOIN transactions t ON u.user_id = t.user_id JOIN user_roles r ON u.user_id = r.user_id;
SELECT * FROM ownership WHERE owner_name = 'Alice' AND owner_address LIKE '%Street%';
